title: How to Prepare an Easy & Delicious Lettuce Salad

steps.title: Wash the lettuce.
steps.content: Wash the lettuce. Separate lettuce from the cluster. If the lettuce is from the garden, then you will need to soak it in salt water or use a drop of bleach to make sure it is properly clean. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Cut the lettuce.
steps.content: Cut the lettuce. Cut the lettuce in whatever size you want, but preferable large cuts on a tray or bowl. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Squeeze the lemons.
steps.content: Squeeze the lemons. If you are using lemon, then squeeze the lemons into a cup. [3] X Research source If you are using vinegar, then pour a reasonable amount into a cup.

steps.title: Add sugar to the vinegar or lemon.
steps.content: Add sugar to the vinegar or lemon. The amount of sugar should be enough to have a thick syrup-like consistency. Mix it very well that the sugar crystals are not visible.

steps.title: Put a small amount of cooking oil into the "syrup".
steps.content: Put a small amount of cooking oil into the "syrup". Mix well.

steps.title: Use a spoon to spread the lemon/vinegar syrup on the cut salad.
steps.content: Use a spoon to spread the lemon/vinegar syrup on the cut salad. Mix lightly.

steps.title: Add sliced tomatoes and onions to your salad and sprinkle on parmesan cheese.
steps.content: Add sliced tomatoes and onions to your salad and sprinkle on parmesan cheese. This is optional.
